name: sbcori
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3
body: |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wo(w0, w1)), wo(w2, w3))

stmt.origin: bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wo(w0, w1)), wo(w2, w3), wo(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wo(w0, w1)), wo(w2, w3))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wo(w0, w1)), wo(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wb(wo(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), wo(w2, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wo(w0, w1)), wo(w2, w3))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wo(w0, w1)), wo(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wb(wo(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), wo(w2, w3))

body.origin: |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wo(w0, w1)), wo(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wo(w0, w1)), wo(w2, w3))
-| wb(wo(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), wo(w2, w3))

stmt.origin: orbi12i(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w2, w3)

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), wo(w2, w3))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w2)
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wo(w0, w1)), wo(w2, w3))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w2)
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w3)

comment: Distribution of class substitution over disjunction, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 27-May-2019.)
